Description: Small turquoise glazed composition figure of a hippopotamus couchant guardant, originally decorated with painted lotus-flower motifs, now faded, chipped in places.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 2, p. 614. Behrman, Das Nilpferd (Frankfurt-a-M, 1989), Dok. 142 f.34. H.R. Hall, JEA vol. XIII, p.57.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
